text: [Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm sarda a technical customer
service associate here at the AWS office
in Cape Town today I'm going to show you
how to use AWS promotional credits
towards your cost for reserved instances
or savings plans let's get
started before we start note that you
can't apply promotional credits towards
The Upfront purchase for partial upfront
reserved instances all upfront reserved
instances or savings plans however
promotional credits can cover the
charges that you incur per hour for
running instances whether you have
partial upfront reserved instances no
upfront reserved instances or savings
plans let me show you how to check
whether your promotional credits apply
to a specific
service log in to the A s Management
console then go to the AWS billing and
cost Management console from the
navigation pane on the left select CED
here under the applicable product
section you can see the services that
your promotional credits can be applied
to note that if your account is part of
an AWS organization demotional credits
might be applied differently across the
organization's Consolidated billing so
now you know how to use AWS promotional
credits towards your cost for reserved
instances or savings
plans thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
[Applause]
[Music]
